column4: How can i delete changes i made to the default gdm greeter? It now explodes with a "Greeter keeps crashing" message and i just want to go back to dapper's default without it exploding :(
switched themes from the preferences in gnome

after which it no longer works, giving a Greeter Keeps Crashing error and falling back to the default greeter, ironically the one it falls back to looks just like what i had selected and tried to go back to...\
does it let you login then?
sadly nothing, x is working ok, it's a gdm thing
if it lets you login, can you switch back to the original screen?
and yes, i would try a reintsall
I can login, what happens is the default greeter crashes several times, so it uses a fallback
is the greeter app part of gdm or?
had to cp the /etc/gdm to ~, del /etc/gdm, reinstall package, cp the gdm.conf and Xkeepscrashing and Xsession files back to /etc/gdm but it works, cheers!
